data.question: What is the empirical formula of SION-19?
What temperature was used for single-crystal X-ray diffraction data collection of SION-19?
What is the space group of SION-19?
What is the formula unit of SION-19 after desolvation (SION-19')?
What is the BET surface area of SION-19'?
What is the loading percentage of thymine in SION-19' for successful dimerization?
What is the elution time of thymine in UHPLC-EIS/MS analysis?
Is the dimerization of thymine to form Thy<>Thy observed in HKUST-1?
Does the presence of adenine in SION-19 facilitate the dimerization of thymine?
What is the conversion rate of thymine to Thy<>Thy in SION-19' at 40% loading?
What is the experimental parent ion m/z for Thy<>Thy in UHPLC-EIS/MS analysis?
What is the elution time for Thy<>Thy in UHPLC-EIS/MS analysis?
Can Zn-MOF-74 facilitate the dimerization of thymine?
What is the role of adenine in SION-19 for thymine dimerization?
data.answer: Adenine acts as a structure-directing agent that 'locks' thymine molecules into positions close enough for photodimerization to occur.

data.question: Is the dimerization of thymine to Thy<>Thy observed in Bio-MOF-1?
What is the formula of the novel bio-MOF reported in the study?
What is the crystal system of SION-19?
What is the percentage of guest molecules in SION-19?
What is the role of the Woodward-Hoffmann and Schmidt rules in the study?
data.answer: They govern the conditions for successful dimerization of thymine molecules in SION-19.

data.question: Is the dimerization of thymine to Thy<>Thy a unique property of SION-19 compared to other MOFs tested?
